title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When attempting to create a JAR file using the JAR packager, an error message is displayed stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: After pressing the 'Finish' button on the JAR packager, a message is displayed indicating that the JAR creation failed due to unsaved editors.
EB: I expect the JAR packager to check for unsaved editors before attempting to create the JAR file and display a prompt to save any unsaved changes.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Make edits in a file without saving. 2. Open the JAR packager for the project. 3. Enter all required information such as path, destination, name of the JAR packager, and description. 4. Press the 'Finish' button.
